gamemode.description: Name of the gamemode the player should have in order for this condition to evaluate to true.
gamemode.markdownDescription: Name of the gamemode the player should have in order for this condition to evaluate to true.

type.description:
## Gamemode

---



[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/gamemode)

Checks the gamemode of the entity.

Type ID: `origins:gamemode`



---

### üìù Note

__This entity condition type will only work on players.__






---

### Examples

```json
"condition": {
  "type": "origins:gamemode",
  "gamemode": "creative"
}
```

This example will check if the player is in Creative Mode.
